ygData.subject: Re: Quick question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Say it s not true!  I played AO for the first month and it was terrible.  You think lag is bad in EQ?  You d go LD 3 times walking across the city. They
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@y..., nara MKs <masterkiis_nara@y...> wrote:
> If one deactivates their account are the characters
> there lost forever or can you come back and find
> "everyone" there with all their equipment and such?
>
> BF is playing AO and it gets expensive trying to
> maintain more than one game at a time :-)
>
> Amaiya
>
> __________________________________________________
> Do You Yahoo!?
> Yahoo! Health - your guide to health and wellness
> http://health.yahoo.com

Say it's not true! I played AO for the first month and it was
terrible. You think lag is bad in EQ? You'd go LD 3 times walking
across the city.

They used us as beta testers and we were paying for the privilage!
And even with all the supposed fixes it still sucked.

Stay with us Amaiya!

Tuldayen Grimblade
35th season Ranger of Tunare
Terris-Thule
